rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg001
rows.name:
So how d'you like this palace, eh?
Just as good as your Superbian one.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg002
rows.name:
For a man who abandoned his country,
you're certainly proud of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg003
rows.name: Hey. That's a low blow.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg004
rows.name:
Do you think you'll return
for good someday?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg005
rows.name: ...That's a toughie.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg006
rows.name: What is it that's stopping you?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg007
rows.name:
Hey, Meleph.
Is your country important to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg008
rows.name: That was kind of out of the blue...

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg009
rows.name:
Come on, just tell me.
Would you protect your country
over anything else in the world?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg021
rows.name: How should I answer...

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg022
rows.name: Without a doubt.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg023
rows.name: Would you not?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg101
rows.name: Why do you ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg102
rows.name:
Well, I mean... As a prince, of course
you're gonna want to protect your
country and your people.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg103
rows.name: But...is that really enough?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg104
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg105
rows.name:
This world, it's stretched to its limit.
We've both seen that on our travels.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg107
rows.name:
Now, my old man, he closed off our
country from the outside world.
Why? To protect his people.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg108
rows.name:
But that's not a real solution.
That's just running away from reality.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg109
rows.name:
Maybe you can protect your own
people like that, for a while. But when
the world ends, you're just as dead.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg110
rows.name:
I just couldn't bring myself to agree
with the way he does things.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg111
rows.name: And...that's why you left?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg112
rows.name:
Yeah... If I can use my power to help
save the world, even a little...

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg120
rows.name:
I figured, that's what I have to do.
Help the people who need it.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg113
rows.name:
Of course, I was younger then,
with naive ambitions.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg114
rows.name:
In the end, I just wound up learning
how powerless I really am.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg115
rows.name:
But you haven't given up yet, have you?
You're still trying to save the world.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg116
rows.name:
Course I am. If you don't have the
power, you gotta try even harder.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg117
rows.name:
If you can't do it alone, then you gotta
find some friends to back you up.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg118
rows.name:
Meleph. You're one of those people,
right? Someone I can count on.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg119
rows.name:
Haha...
I'm with you, Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg217
rows.name:
Wishing to protect your country is both
a natural impulse and a duty, is it not?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg201
rows.name:
That's the one! That's exactly
what my old man used to say.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg202
rows.name: But...is that really enough?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg203
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg204
rows.name:
This crazy world's right at its limit.
If it carries on like this, it's done for.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg205
rows.name:
My old man... He chose to close his
eyes to the outside world and only
think of the safety of our country.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg206
rows.name:
A king's first duty is to protect his
nation. I don't think I can blame him
for the choice he made.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg207
rows.name:
Well, yeah... But is it reallyokay to just
think of yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg208
rows.name:
Can you really be happy when you're
shut up in your own world like that?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg209
rows.name:
If we carry on like this, our whole world
has had it. And you can't have a
country without a world.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg210
rows.name: That's why his attitude drove me crazy.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg211
rows.name:
Sitting doing nothing as the whole
shebang falls down... That's no way
for anyone to live.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg218
rows.name:
I can't just give up on the future like
that.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg212
rows.name:
That's why I left Luxuria.
And that's why I can't go back,
not until the world is safe.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg213
rows.name:
Hahah... You're a remarkably
straightforward man.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg219
rows.name:
Honestly, I'm a little jealous of the way
you can follow your heart so freely.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg214
rows.name: Hey, what are you saying?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg220
rows.name:
It's not like it's hard. You should try it
yourself - just say what you think!

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg215
rows.name: Hah...

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg221
rows.name:
Straightforward guys like you and Rex
are all very well, but I think someone
needs to attend to the finer details.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg216
rows.name:
Jeez, you let me have it with both
barrels there... But thanks.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg222
rows.name: You can count on me for that, Zeke!
